author: mkwan
msg: Fix a bug in the XPathException(Throwable) constructor.
Pass the message from the cause Throwable to the super constructor,
so that the getMessage() method on this XPathException would
return the message of the cause.

author: mkwan
msg: Fix compile time dependency on File.toURI() which is new to JDK 1.4.
Use reflection instead of a direct method call.

author: mkwan
msg: Change the default service provider back to org.apache.xalan.processor.TransformerFactoryImpl,
which was the default before the JAXP 1.3 integration.

author: mkwan
msg: Migrate a bug fix for printStackTrace which was done before the JAXP 1.3 integration

author: mrglavas
msg: No functional changes. Updating DOM Level 2 errata:
